title: MY BROTHER WAS BANNED FOR Third Party But he's TRASH! lol

replies.body:
Multiple players using the same computer to play sometimes comes with the risk of one of them downloading illegal applications or modifying game files, which could result in other users of that client to be flagged whether they are actively participating in abusing them or not.

That's just a theory, though, I can't tell you why your brother was banned. He needs to submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and explain his situation to Player Support.
Ok, this makes no sense tbh. Banned for 3rd party, does he have a skin 3rd party like wooxy or something? or was it because he had a sudden spike it winrate/kda? idk, your paragraph confused me
tbh bro i dont even know what to say! but I will take Namis advice and telling to submit a support ticket! I know he doesnt script but i was thinking that was the only bannable offense up until now
